paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: heart failure due to ATTR cardiomyopathy

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The median age of enrolled patients was 75 years and 90% of patients were males.

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile mutation is associated with a significant risk of developing ATTR cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation is one of the most common pathogenic mutations in TTR.
key_quotes: The Val122Ile mutation, which is carried in 3–4% of African Americans.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The median age of enrolled patients was 75 years and 90% of patients were males.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation is one of the common pathogenic mutations in TTR.
